TODO: Tests to check combinations e.g. one dimension of lhs with whole signal on the right if dimension match

bothSignalsTotal.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(10)) a <=> b

oneBitOfLhs.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(1)) a.0 <=> b

bitRangeOfLhs.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(3)) a.2:4 <=> b

oneDimensionOfLhs.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(10)) a[1] <=> b

oneBitOfOneDimensionOfLhs.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(1)) a[1].4 <=> b

bitRangeOfOneDimensionOfLhs.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(3)) a[1].2:4 <=> b

oneBitAsCompileTimeExpressionOfLhs.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(1)) for $i = 0 to 9 step 1 do a.($i + (2 + $i)) <=> b rof

bitRangeOfLhsAsCompileTimeExpressionOfLh.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(10)) for $i = 0 to 9 step 1 do a.($i + (2 + $i)):$i <=> b rof

oneDimensionOfLhsAsCompileTimeExpression.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(10)) for $i = 0 to 9 step 1 do a[($i + (2 + $i))] <=> b rof

oneBitOfRhs.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(1)) b <=> a.0

bitRangeOfRhs.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(3)) b <=> a.2:4

oneDimensionOfRhs.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(10)) b <=> a[1]

oneBitOfOneDimensionOfRhs.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(1)) b <=> a[1].4

bitRangeOfOneDimensionOfRhs.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(3)) b <=> a[1].2:4

oneBitAsCompileTimeExpressionOfRhs.circuit: module main(out a(1), out b(10)) for $i = 0 to 9 step 1 do a <=> b.($i + (2 + $i)) rof

bitRangeOfRhsAsCompileTimeExpressionOfLh.circuit: module main(out a(10), out b(10)) for $i = 0 to 9 step 1 do a <=> b.($i + (2 + $i)):$i rof

oneDimensionOfRhsAsCompileTimeExpression.circuit: module main(out a[2](10), out b(10)) for $i = 0 to 9 step 1 do a <=> b[($i + (2 + $i))] rof
